name: Pringles Game
description:
Hi everyone In this game, you are a Pringles Chip and you need to kill the bad pringles and hey- more levels come in every update so stay tuned! But sadly, I hate to say that this game is not playable on mobile phones, only on PC's... Sorry mobile players :(

(although i might do an update for mobile players too!)

*DOWNLOADS ARE ON THE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE*

Info about me-

Name- (SUPA SECRET!)

Age- 11

I personally love coding but without these softwares, my project won't be possible. Please support them too!

TurboWarp Packager- https://packager.turbowarp.org/

Scratch - https://scratch.mit.edu

 Alright everyone, have a good day and please donate if you like it and bye bye!
